column4: Help ... I'm trying to install skype again. Am I right in saying that skype doesn't work for ubuntu64 without the skype hijacker being installed ?
did you need the hijacker ? ... how did you do it ?
where did you find that ? ... btw I'm on 64 bit :-(
: don't know if it will work correctly on a 64-bit, but you might wanna try
: did you add them to your sources.list?
It said it was doing that automatically ... sourcing 32 bit repositories isn't going to do me much good (methinks!).
it sources them automatically ... it seems like they are not there ...
no it's looking for 64 bit packages alright ... but 64bit breezy packages
if it works, tell me and I'll do a little script for future users
cool, I think I'll try a chroot ... I don't want to force any packages if possible
